name: SKUAST Kashmir (Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences & Technology)

content.College Info: SKUAST Kashmir (Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences & Technology), located in Wadura/ Shalimar, is a prestigious A NAAC accredited government institution offering world-class agricultural university programs. The college is known for its excellent academic standards, state-of-the-art infrastructure, and strong industry connections. Students gain admission through University Entrance and benefit from experienced faculty, modern laboratories, and comprehensive learning resources. The institution maintains high placement rates and provides students with opportunities for research, internships, and skill development programs.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • B.Tech in Agriculture and allied fields
  • B.Sc. (Hons) in Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry
  • B.V.Sc. and A.H
  • M.Sc â€“ Agronomy, Genetics, Sericulture, Horticulture, Food Technology, etc.
  • M.F.Sc (Fisheries Science)
  • M.Tech and Ph.D programs
